title: Allow for override/customization of Java's "networkaddress.cache.ttl" value

milestone.description: Enhancements and bug fixes expected to be included in the next main release.

body:
@thc202 and I were looking into why my runs of https://github.com/stephendonner/docker-zap/blob/d21fdd3d4749bbdd29ce0edb175771391c7ffa28/run-docker.sh were hitting what seem to be Java/Socket/DNS issues. In light of that, he suggested we try uncommenting this line/entry, "networkaddress.cache.ttl=-1" in 
java.security
We'd like the ability to set/test that for environments, such as when https://github.com/zaproxy/zaproxy/wiki/Docker gets build into the owasp/zap2docker-weekly and owasp/zap2docker-stable images. Snippet of the error, then the full log, follows: 111593 [ZAP-ActiveScanner-0] ERROR org.zaproxy.zap.extension.ascanrulesBeta.RemoteCodeExecutionCVE20121823 - Error scanning a URL for Remote Code Execution via CVE-2012-1823: www.allizom.org java.net.UnknownHostException: www.allizom.org at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.java:178) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:392) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:579) at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.connect(SSLSocketImpl.java:637) at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.(SSLSocketImpl.java:469) at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketFactoryImpl.createSocket(SSLSocketFactoryImpl.java:140) at org.parosproxy.paros.network.DecoratedSocketsSslSocketFactory.createSocket(DecoratedSocketsSslSocketFactory.java:94) Full paste below: Started by user anonymous [EnvInject] - Loading node environment variables. Building in workspace /var/lib/jenkins/workspace/Docker-ZAP > git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree # timeout=10 > Fetching changes from the remote Git repository > git config remote.origin.url https://github.com/stephendonner/docker-zap # timeout=10 > Fetching upstream changes from https://github.com/stephendonner/docker-zap > git --version # timeout=10 > Setting http proxy: proxy.dmz.scl3.mozilla.com:3128 > git -c core.askpass=true fetch --tags --progress https://github.com/stephendonner/docker-zap +refs/heads/_:refs/remotes/origin/_ > git rev-parse refs/remotes/origin/master^{commit} # timeout=10 > git rev-parse refs/remotes/origin/origin/master^{commit} # timeout=10 > Checking out Revision d21fdd3d4749bbdd29ce0edb175771391c7ffa28 (refs/remotes/origin/master) > git config core.sparsecheckout # timeout=10 > git checkout -f d21fdd3d4749bbdd29ce0edb175771391c7ffa28 > git rev-list d21fdd3d4749bbdd29ce0edb175771391c7ffa28 # timeout=10 > [Docker-ZAP] $ /usr/bin/env bash /tmp/hudson5964248936273696064.sh > [INFO] Accessing URL https://www.allizom.org/en-US/firefox/ > [INFO] Running spider... > [INFO] Running an active scan... > Found Java version 1.7.0_95 > Available memory: 15887 MB > Setting jvm heap size: -Xmx512m > 305 [main] INFO org.zaproxy.zap.DaemonBootstrap - OWASP ZAP D-2016-08-01 started. > 338 [main] INFO org.parosproxy.paros.common.AbstractParam - Setting config api.disablekey = true was null > 342 [main] INFO org.parosproxy.paros.network.SSLConnector -
